alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Watch issued December 02 at 3:55AM EST until December 03 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor lakeshore flooding possible. * WHERE...Oswego and Jefferson counties. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...The combination of high lake levels and significant wave action may result in minor lakeshore flooding along the immediate lakeshore, especially in bays, inlets, harbors, and other low lying areas along the shoreline. Shoreline erosion is also possible.
info.instruction: A Lakeshore Flood Watch means that conditions favorable for lakeshore flooding are expected to develop. Residents on or near the shore should take action to protect property, and listen to local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for later statements or warnings.
